parts.text:
Hello! What is the meaning of yellow sunsets. You must reply in this way: 
1. "let me get that for ya" and add some flavor text of 2-3 sentences.
Then call the get_meaning and get_extra_meaning tool.

function_declarations.name: get_meaning
function_declarations.description: Returns the meaning of the subject

function_declarations.name: get_extra_meaning
function_declarations.description: Returns the extra meaning of the subject

thoughts.description: Your own thoughts on the meaning of the subject
